title: TagVerificationReport
description: Result of verifying cost allocation tags in synthesized CloudFormation template(s)

ok.description: True if every taggable resource has all required cost allocation tags

requiredTagKeys.description: Tag keys that must be present on every taggable resource

missingTags.description: Resources that are taggable but missing one or more required tags

nonTaggable.description: Resource types or logical IDs that do not support Tags (informational)
